榠字的基本解释

榠
míng
〔榠??（
zh?）〕落叶灌木或小乔木，叶卵形，果实长椭圆形，黄色，有香气，中医学上入药称“光皮木瓜”。亦称“木瓜”。

榠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［míng］
见“榠楂”。

榠字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榠； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页543第23
【唐韻】莫經切【集韻】忙經切，?音螟。【玉篇】榠?，果也。【蘇頌·圖經】榠?，木葉花實酷類木瓜。欲辨之，蔕閒別有重蔕如乳者爲木瓜，無者爲榠?。【通志略】一名蠻?，一名木李，一名木梨。　又【集韻】母迥切，音茗。茶晚取者。

榠字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
榠字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese quince
Basic explanation of words
Chinese quince
míng
〔Chinese quince??(
zh?)] Deciduous shrubs or small trees, with oval leaves, oblong fruit, yellow, and fragrant. It is used in traditional Chinese medicine as "papaya". Also known as "papaya".
Chinese quince
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［míng］
See "Hawthorn".
Chinese quince
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　榠; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 543 23
[Tang Yun] Mo Jingqie [Jiyun] Busy Jingqie, sound borer. [Jade articles] 榠?, fruit is also. 【Su Song·Picture Classic】Papaya, Konoha flower real cool papaya. If you want to distinguish it, those with heavy pedicles like breasts are papaya, and those without stalks are stalks. [Tong Zhilue] One man?, one muli, and one muli.　[Jiyun] The mother is very cut, and the sound is Ming. Tea late taker.
